StringProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerCommandArguments
StringProperty.Description: The command line arguments to pass to the application.

EnumProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerExecutableLoadLocation
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies where to load the application's executable from.

StringProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerCommand
StringProperty.Description: The path to the executable to debug on the host PC.

StringProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerCommandTarget
StringProperty.Description: The path to the executable to debug on the devkit. This will be located in the /data directory.

StringProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerWorkingDirectory
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the working directory (/app0) to use. This setting is overridden if a working directory is specified in the path mapping file.

StringProperty.Name: LocalMappingFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path to the mapping file.

EnumProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerSystemLibraryVerification
EnumProperty.Description: Perform argument validation for specific SDK functions. When Debugging, an exception dialog will be displayed on failure. When Running, "Warn" will generate a console message, and "Abort" will also exit the process.

StringProperty.Name: LocalRunCommandLine
StringProperty.Description: The additional command line arguments to pass to the Run utility when using Start Without Debugging.
